name: Medium Black Denim Doggie Coat (12-507)
description:
This medium black denim doggie coat (11 pounds to 31 pounds) is made from a pair of Riders jeans which are 100% cotton and lined with soft white fleece with paw prints.  The neck and belly bands easily connect with Velcro. 

This coat is washable on cool gentle cycle and dry on low temperature.

name: Medium Dark Blue Jean Doggie Coat (12-506)
description:
This medium dark blue jean doggie coat (11 pounds to 31 pounds) is made from a Gitano jeans which is 100% cotton and lined with soft blue printed fleece.  The neck and belly bands easily connect with Velcro. 

This coat is washable on cool gentle cycle and dry on low temperature.

name: Medium Dark Camel Doggie Coat with Green Printed Fleece (11-767)
description:
This medium dark camel wool doggie coat (11 pounds to 31 pounds) is made from a Scottish wool blanket which is 100% wool and lined with soft green printed fleece.  The neck and belly bands easily connect with Velcro. 

This coat is washable on cool gentle cycle and dry on low temperature.

name: Medium Dark Blue Pendleton Doggie Coat (11-764)
description:
This medium dark blue wool doggie coat (11 pounds to 31 pounds) is made from a Pendleton wool blanket which is 100% wool and lined with a bright red with colorful dot fleece.  The neck and belly bands easily connect with Velcro. 

This coat is washable on cool gentle cycle and dry on low temperature.

name: Medium Stripped Cashmere Doggie Coat (11-637)
description:
This stripped 100% cashmere doggie coat (11 pounds to 31 pounds) is made from a Scottish wool blanket lined with soft cream fleece.  The neck and belly bands easily connect with Velcro. 

This coat is washable on cool gentle cycle and dry on low temperature.

name: Medium Light Blue Doggie Coat (11-761)
description:
This medium light blue wool doggie coat (11 pounds to 31 pounds) is made from a Bruges wool blanket which is 100% wool and lined with soft geen fleece.  The neck and belly bands easily connect with Velcro. 

This coat is washable on cool gentle cycle and dry on low temperature.

name: Medium Dark Camel Doggie Coat (11-635)
description:
This medium dark camel wool doggie coat (11 pounds to 31 pounds) is made from a Scottish wool blanket which is 100% wool and lined with soft leopard skin fleece.  The neck and belly bands easily connect with Velcro. 

This coat is washable on cool gentle cycle and dry on low temperature.

name: Small Dark Blue Pendleton Wool Doggie Coat with soft blue fleece (11-763)
description:
This small dark blue wool doggie coat (7 pounds to 11 pounds) is made from a Pendleton Blanket which is 100% wool and lined with soft blue fleece.  The neck and belly bands easily connect with Velcro. 

This coat is washable on cool gentle cycle and dry on low temperature.

name: Small Navy Blue Pendleton Wool Doggie Coat (11-762)
description:
This small navy blue wool doggie coat (7 pounds to 11 pounds) is made from a Pendleton Blanket which is 100% wool and lined with soft brown and green fleece.  The neck and belly bands easily connect with Velcro. 

This coat is washable on cool gentle cycle and dry on low temperature.

name: Small Light Pink Doggie Coat (11-514)
description:
This small pink wool doggie coat (7 pounds to 11 pounds) is made from a Chatham Blanket which is 100% wool and lined with soft blue green fleece.  The neck and belly bands easily connect with Velcro. 

This coat is washable on cool gentle cycle and dry on low temperature.

name: Small Light Green Wool Doggie Coat (12-501)
description: This small doggie coat (7 pounds to 11 pounds) is lined with soft red with different colored dots fleece.  This coat was made from a 100% wool blanket.  There was no tag on this blanket.  The neck and belly bands easily connect with Velcro.

name: Small Blue Jean Doggie Coat (12-503)
description: This small doggie coat (7 pounds to 11 pounds) is lined with soft blue and doggies fleece.  This coat was made from a pair of L.A.Jeans which were 100% cotton.  The neck and belly bands easily connect with Velcro.

name: Small Black Jean Denim Doggie Coat (12-505)
description: This small doggie coat (7 pounds to 11 pounds) is lined with soft white fleece with doggie footprints.  This coat was made from a pair of Riders jeans which were 99% cotton and 1%spandex.  The neck and belly bands easily connect with Velcro.

name: Small Olive Green Jean Doggie Coat (12-504)
description: This small doggie coat (7 pounds to 11 pounds) is lined with soft green and white plaid fleece.  This coat was made from a pair of Jeanology jeans which were 100% cotton.  The neck and belly bands easily connect with Velcro.

name: Blue Jean Christmas Stocking with Santa Ringing Bell (12-1001)
description: This Christmas stocking is made from a pair of Gitana Jeans. The Santa is made from fleece scraps and appliquéd to the stocking.   It is 12" high by 6" wide. There is plenty of room for Santa to fill. It is lined with a light green fleece to match the heel and toe.  It is monogrammed with "HO HO HO" in red embroidery thread.

name: Blue Jean Christmas Stocking with Santa Holding Star (12-1000)
description: This Christmas stocking is made from a pair of L.A.Blues Jeans. The Santa is made from fleece scraps and appliquéd to the stocking.   It is 12" high by 6" wide. There is plenty of room for Santa to fill. It is lined with a dark green fleece to match the heel and toe.  It is monogrammed with "Happy Holiday" in red embroidery thread.

name: Patriotic Blue, Red and Silver Christmas Stocking (240-021)
description: This Christmas Stocking is simple and attractive.  It is 12" high by 6" wide.  There is plenty of room for Santa to fill.  It was made from a 100% new pure wool Irish Collection sweater and lined with a bright red fleece and trimmed with a series of silver sparkly star buttons.

name: Pale Green Cable Christmas Stocking with Pine Tree (240-030)
description: This Christmas Stocking is simple and attractive.  It is 12" high by 6" wide.  There is plenty of room for Santa to fill.  It was made from a 100% lambswool GAP sweater and lined with a soft pale green fleece.

name: Beautiful Blue Stocking with Angel in Pink (240-031)
description: This beautiful Christmas Stocking has an angel appliqued.  It is 12" high by 6" wide.  There is plenty of room for Santa to fill.  It was made from a 100% wool Jantzen Sweater and lined with a soft hot pink fleece.  The top is lined with hot pink beads and bric-a-brac.

name: Plain Royal Blue Christmas Stocking with Burgundy Beads (240-021)
description: This Christmas Stocking is simple and attractive.  It is 12" high by 6" wide.  There is plenty of room for Santa to fill.  It was made from a North Cape Sweater and lined with a soft royal blue fleece.  The stocking is 85% wool and 15% nylon.

name: Nice Plain Burgundy Christmas Stocking with Beads ((240-021)
description: This Christmas Stocking is simple and attractive.  It is 12" high by 6" wide.  There is plenty of room for Santa to fill.  It was made from a 100% wool Eastern Mountain Sport Sweater and lined with a soft royal blue fleece.

name: Dark Blue Wool Mittens (12-039)
description:
These wonderful dark blue mittens were made from a 100% lamb’s wool.  They were made from an Old Navy sweater.  They are lined with a soft grey blue fleece.

These mittens are a Small size.

name: Bright Yellow Wool Mittens (12-033)
description:
These wonderful bright yellow mittens were made from 100% shetland wool.  They were made from a Johnathan Stewart sweater.  They are lined with a hot pink dotted fleece.

These mittens are a Medium size.

name: Soft Olive Green Mittens with Buttons (12-047)
description:
These wonderful soft olive green mittens were made from a 100% merino wool.  They were made from a Susan Bristol sweater.  They are lined with a soft colorful fleece.  These mittens came from the sleeves of this sweater which had buttons.

These mittens are a Medium size.

name: Olive Green Wool Mittens (12-046)
description:
These wonderful olive green mittens were made from a 100% merino wool.  They were made from a Susan Bristol sweater.  They are lined with a soft wavy stripe fleece.

These mittens are a small size.

name: Light Brown Wool Mittens (12-032)
description:
These wonderful light brown mittens were made from a 100% hand knitted wool sweater.  Because the sweater was hand made there was no label. They are lined with a soft argyle fleece.

These mittens are a Large size

name: Black Print Large Mittens with a Red Trim (12-030)
description:
These wonderful large black print mittens were made from a 58% acrylic, 35% wool, 4% angora, and 3% nylon.  They were made from a Jenny Buchanon sweater.  They are lined with a soft black fleece.

These mittens are a Large size.

name: Colorful Printed Mittens ((12-029)
description:
These wonderful bright colored print mittens were made from a 58% acrylic, 35% wool, 4% angora, and 3%nylon.  They were made from a Jenny Buchanon sweater.  They are lined with a soft hot pink fleece.

These mittens are a medium size.

name: Burgundy Wool Mittens  (12-045)
description:
These wonderful burgundy wool mittens were made from a 100%  wool.  They were made from a Woolrich sweater.  They are lined with a soft striped fleece.

These mittens are a medium size.

name: Dark Blue Tweedy Look Mittens (12-031)
description:
These wonderful blue mittens have flicks of many colors.  they were made from a 80% wool, and 20% nylon Express sweater.  They are lined with a soft yellow fleece.

These are a medium sized mitten.

name: Large Print Wool Mittens (12-035)
description:
These wonderful dark printed mittens were made from a 100% wool.  They were made from a Woolrich sweater.  They are lined with a soft burgundy fleece to bring out the print.

These Mitten are a large size.

name: Bright Red Wool Mittens (12-036)
description:
These wonderful bright red mittens were made from a 70% wool, 22% nylon and 8% acrylic.  They were made from a sweater that had the tag removed.  They are lined with a soft red plaid fleece.

These mittens are a small size.

name: Fancy Cream Mittens with Buttons (11-64)
description:
These wonderful fancy cream mittens were made from 100% wool. They were made from a Karen Scott sweater.  They are lined with a soft green snowflake fleece

These mittens are a medium size

name: Bright Aqua Wool/Angora Mittens (12-041)
description:
These wonderful bright aqua mittens were made from a 60% lamb’s wool, 17% angora, 13% precious fur, and 10%nylon.  They were made from a Bobbie Brook’s sweater.  They are lined with a soft argyle fleece

These mittens are a small.

name: Printed Blue Grey Mittens (12-037,12-038)
description: These wonderful  printed mittens were made from a 100% wool  sweater.  The tag was removed so I was unable to tell what the brand name was.  They are lined with a soft grey blue fleece.

name: Soft Grey Woolen Mittens ((12-042,12-043)
description: These wonderful  grey mittens were made from a 100% wool  Appleseed sweater.  They are lined with a soft light grey fleece.

name: Bright Red Hand Warmers (12-003), (12-004)
description: These lovely bright red hand warmers are made from a Ann Taylor sweater and lined with a soft white fleece.  These are warm and practical.  You keep your hands warm but your fingers free.

name: Bright Aqua Hand Warmers (12-018)
description: These lovely LARGE aqua hand warmers are made from a Woolrich sweater and lined with a soft "flower power "fleece.  These are warm and practical.  You keep your hands warm but your fingers free.

name: Soft Blue Cashmere Hand Warmers (12-016)
description: These lovely Medium 100% cashmere pale blue hand warmers are made from a Charter Club sweater and lined with a soft white fleece.  These are warm and practical.  You keep your hands warm but your fingers free.

name: Pale Yellow Hand Warmers ((12-A001), (12-A002)
description: These lovely soft pale yellow hand warmers are made from a Amanda Smith Collection sweater and lined with a soft yellow fleece.  These are warm and practical.  You keep your hands warm but your fingers free.

name: Red Cashmere Hand Warmers (12-A005,12-A006)
description: These lovely red 100% cashmere hand warmers are made from a Terryl for Thallan sweater and lined with a soft red fleece.  These are warm and practical.  You keep your hands warm but your fingers free.

name: Burgundy Hand Warmers (12-017)
description: These lovely extra-large burgundy hand warmers are made from a Woolrich sweater and lined with a colorful striped fleece.  These are warm and practical.  You keep your hands warm but your fingers free.

name: Granny Apple Green Hand Warmers (12-007),(12-008)
description: These lovely granny apple green hand warmers are made from a Griffen sweater and lined with a soft green and white plaid fleece.  These are warm and practical.  You keep your hands warm but your fingers free.

name: Light Brown Hand Warmers (12-019)
description: These medium sized, lovely brown hand warmers are made from a hand knitted sweater and lined with a brown pink dotted fleece.  These are warm and practical.  You keep your hands warm but your fingers free.

name: Light Blue Cable Hand Warmers (12-014),(12-015)
description: These lovely light blue cable hand warmers are made from a Charter Club sweater and lined with a grey blue fleece.  These are warm and practical.  You keep your hands warm but your fingers free.

name: Beige Hand Warmers (12-012),(12-013)
description: These lovely beige hand warmers are made from a woolrich sweater and lined with a soft beige fleece.  These are warm and practical.  You keep your hands warm but your fingers free.

name: Dark Brown Denim Hipster with Dragonfly applique (12-605)
description: This denim purse is 8 1/2" wide, 9 1/2" high, and 1 1/2" deep.  It was made from a pair of Rider jeans I purchased from KMart in Malone, N.Y. in 2004.  It is lined with a colorful fleece to match the dragonfly.  There is a double pocket on the inside and a pocket on the outside.  The design is made from fleece scraps and machine appliquéd on to the purse.

name: Dark Brown Denim Hipster with Sunflower applique (12-607)
description: This denim purse is 8 1/2" wide, 9 1/2" high, and 1 1/2" deep.  It was made from a pair of Rider jeans I purchased from KMart in Malone, N.Y. in 2004.  It is lined with green fleece to match the green leaves.  There is a double pocket on the inside and a pocket on the outside.  The design is made from fleece scraps and machine appliquéd on to the purse.

name: Black Denim Hipster With Black Eyed Susans (12-602)
description: This denim purse is 8 1/2" wide, 9 1/2" high, and 1 1/2" deep.  It was made from a pair of Rider jeans I purchased from KMart in Malone, N.Y. in 2004.  It is lined with yellow fleece to match the yellow flowers.  There is a double pocket on the inside and a pocket on the outside.  The design is made from fleece scraps and machine appliquéd on to the purse.

name: Black Denim Hipster With Embroidered Peace Bird (12-601)
description: This denim purse is 8 1/2" wide, 9 1/2" high, and 1 1/2" deep.  It was made from a pair of Rider jeans I purchased from KMart in Malone, N.Y. in 2004.  It is lined with orange fleece to match the background of the embroidery.  There is a double pocket on the inside and a lined pocket on the outside.

name: Dark Blue Denim Hipster with Bird on lined outside pocket (12-611)
description: This denim purse is 8 1/2" wide, 9 1/2" high, and 1 1/2" deep.  It was made from a pair of L.A. Blues jeans I purchased from St. Vincent's in Malone, N.Y.   It is lined with hot pink fleece to match the pink flowers on the branch the bird is sitting on.  There is also a double pocket on the inside.  The design is made from fleece scraps and machine appliquéd on to the purse.

name: Denim Hipster with Winged Heart (12-603)
description: This denim purse is 8 1/2" wide, 9 1/2" high, and 1 1/2" deep.  It was made from a pair of Rider jeans I purchased from KMart in Malone, N.Y. in 2004.  It is lined with red fleece and has a red zipper to match the red heart.  There is a double pocket on the inside and a pocket on the outside.  The design is made from fleece scraps and machine appliquéd on to the purse.

name: Dark brown denim Ditty Bag with Dragonflys (12-608)
description:
This "ditty bag" is made of brown denim from a pair of brown jeans I purchased from KMart in Malone, New York way back in 2004.  They are Rider jeans.  
This purse is 10" high and 6" wide.  The bright red roping matches one of the dragonflys and the bright red fleece lining.  It has 3 outer "easy access pockets. The dragonflys are cut from different colored fleece and appliquéd on to the purse.

name: Blue jean "Ditty Bag" with Tulips (12-610)
description:
This "ditty bag" is made of blue denim from a pair of blue jeans I purchased from KMart in Malone, New York way back in 2004.  They are Rider jeans.  
This purse is 10" high and 6" wide.  The bright orange roping matches one of the tulips and the bright orange fleece lining.  It has 3 outer "easy access pockets. The tulips are cut from different colored fleece and appliqued on to the purse.

name: Black denim sturdy shoulder bag with dragonfly with needle sketch (12-612)
description:
This shoulder bag is made of black denim from a pair of black jeans I purchased from St. Vincent de Paul in Massena, New York.  The label had been removed so I do not know the brand name.  
This purse is 9" high, 8" wide, and 4" deep.  The shoulder strap is adjustable and measures 13" from the top of the strap to the top of the purse.  It has 3 outer "easy access pockets and one inside large pocket.  It is fully lined with a lovely green to match the body of the dragon fly.

I sketched the dragonfly by using my sewing machine needle as a pencil.

name: sturdy brown shoulder bag with needle sketch (12-613)
description:
This shoulder bag is made of dark brown denim from a pair of London Jean pants I purchased from St. Vincent de Paul in Malone, New York.  
This purse is 9" high, 8" wide, and 4" deep.  The shoulder strap is adjustable and measures 13" from the top of the strap to the top of the purse.  It has 3 outer "easy access pockets and one inside large pocket.  It is fully lined with a bright yellow flannel and zipper to match the sketch of the queen ann's lace on the front.
I sketched the queen ann's lace by using my sewing machine needle as a pencil.

name: Herbal Moth Repellant
description:
This 1.5 ounce bag contains lavender, red cedar, rosemary, eucalyptus and cloves.  I get this repellant from Harverst Herb Company owned by my friend, Wendy Harrington, and located here in Malone, New York.

I have bags and bags of wool in my house and use nothing but this repellant and do not have a moth problem.  I highly recommend it.  It smells great and is not toxic like moth balls.

name: Navy Blue Purse with Star Pocket
description:
This 9 1/2" by 6" navy blue purse was made from a "Land's 
End" sweater which I purchased from my friend Wendy's shop at the Market Barn in Malone, New York.  I love it when there is a pocket I can incorporate into the purse.

name: Blue Zipper Purse with pocket
description:
This was a fun little purse to make.  The pocket was the actual pocket on an L.L.Bean sweater I purchased from "Geez Louise" in Malone, New York.  It felted up beautifully but was very rough on my sewing machine.

I lined the purse with a colorful soft fleece and added a zipper pocket on the inside for those things you want at your finger tips.  This is a very functional day to day purse.

This purse is approximately 10" high and 7" wide.

name: Red plaid heart drawstring purse
description:
I found this wonderful wool by the yard in "North Country Neighbors" in Potsdam, New York.  The person who was selling it had purchased it from Ballard Mill in Malone, New York when it was closing.  I think it is Woolrich wool.  Woolrich wool and Johnson wool are two of the biggest names in the wool world.
I decided to try an applique on this one...hence the hearts.  The purse is lined with black fleece and the strawstring is a wool yarn rope I made with my embellish knitter.

This purse is 10" high with a 6" circumference
